scripts.backend:dev: cd apps/backend && uv run python manage.py runserver
scripts.backend:migrate: cd apps/backend && uv run python manage.py migrate
scripts.backend:makemigrations: cd apps/backend && uv run python manage.py makemigrations
scripts.backend:shell: cd apps/backend && uv run python manage.py shell
scripts.backend:collectstatic: cd apps/backend && uv run python manage.py collectstatic --noinput
scripts.backend:createsuperuser: cd apps/backend && uv run python manage.py createsuperuser
